alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Pierce; Sheridan; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 13 at 6:44PM CST until February 13 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Wells County in south central North Dakota... Northeastern Sheridan County in south central North Dakota... Southwestern Pierce County in north central North Dakota... Southeastern McHenry County in north central North Dakota... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 640 PM CST, dangerous snow squalls extended along highway 52 from Drake to Martin, and around Sykeston and Bowdon, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts around 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Harvey, Fessenden, Anamoose, Cathay, Heimdal, Bremen, Manfred, Balfour, Hamberg, Selz, Wellsburg, Emrick, Heaton and Orrin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. There is no safe place on a highway when a snow squall hits. Delay travel or safely exit the highway before the snow squall arrives.
